00134 // Utility methods
00135 
00136 template <typename IntegerT, typename FloatT>
00137 inline IntegerT
00138 floatingPointToFixedPoint(const FloatT s)
00139 {
00140     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(boost::is_unsigned<IntegerT>::value);
00141     if (FloatT(0.0) > s) return std::numeric_limits<IntegerT>::min();
00142     else if (FloatT(1.0) <= s) return std::numeric_limits<IntegerT>::max();
00143     return IntegerT(std::floor(s * FloatT(std::numeric_limits<IntegerT>::max())));
00144 }
00145 
00146 
00147 template <typename FloatT, typename IntegerT>
00148 inline FloatT
00149 fixedPointToFloatingPoint(const IntegerT s)
00150 {
00151     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(boost::is_unsigned<IntegerT>::value);
00152     return FloatT(s) / FloatT((std::numeric_limits<IntegerT>::max()));
00153 }
00154 
00155 
00156 template <typename IntegerVectorT, typename FloatT>
00157 inline IntegerVectorT
00158 floatingPointToFixedPoint(const math::Vec3<FloatT>& v)
00159 {
00160     return IntegerVectorT(
00161         floatingPointToFixedPoint<typename IntegerVectorT::ValueType>(v.x()),
00162         floatingPointToFixedPoint<typename IntegerVectorT::ValueType>(v.y()),
00163         floatingPointToFixedPoint<typename IntegerVectorT::ValueType>(v.z()));
00164 }
00165 
00166 template <typename FloatVectorT, typename IntegerT>
00167 inline FloatVectorT
00168 fixedPointToFloatingPoint(const math::Vec3<IntegerT>& v)
00169 {
00170     return FloatVectorT(
00171         fixedPointToFloatingPoint<typename FloatVectorT::ValueType>(v.x()),
00172         fixedPointToFloatingPoint<typename FloatVectorT::ValueType>(v.y()),
00173         fixedPointToFloatingPoint<typename FloatVectorT::ValueType>(v.z()));
00174 }

00181 template<typename StorageType_>
00182 struct NullAttributeCodec
00183 {
00184     typedef StorageType_ StorageType;
00185     template<typename ValueType> static void decode(const StorageType&, ValueType&);
00186     template<typename ValueType> static void encode(const StorageType&, ValueType&);
00187     static const char* name() { return "null"; }
00188 };

00197     static const char* name() { return "fxpt"; }

00214 class AttributeArray
00215 {
00216 protected:
00217     struct AccessorBase;
00218     template <typename T> struct Accessor;
00219 
00220     typedef boost::shared_ptr<AccessorBase>             AccessorBasePtr;
00221 
00222 public:
00223     enum Flag { TRANSIENT = 0x1, HIDDEN = 0x2, GROUP=0x4, WRITEUNIFORM=0x8,
00224                 WRITEMEMCOMPRESS=0x10, WRITEDISKCOMPRESS=0x20, OUTOFCORE=0x40 };
00225 
00226 #ifndef OPENVDB_2_ABI_COMPATIBLE
00227     struct FileInfo
00228     {
00229         FileInfo(): bufpos(0), bytes(0) {}
00230         std::streamoff bufpos;
00231         Index64 bytes;
00232         io::MappedFile::Ptr mapping;
00233         boost::shared_ptr<io::StreamMetadata> meta;
00234     };
00235 #endif
00236 
00237     typedef boost::shared_ptr<AttributeArray>           Ptr;
00238     typedef boost::shared_ptr<const AttributeArray>     ConstPtr;
00239 
00240     template <typename> friend class AttributeHandle;
00241 
00242     typedef Ptr (*FactoryMethod)(size_t);
00243 
00244     AttributeArray() : mCompressedBytes(0), mFlags(0) {}
00245     virtual ~AttributeArray() {}
00246 
00248     virtual AttributeArray::Ptr copy() const = 0;
00249 
00251     virtual AttributeArray::Ptr copyUncompressed() const = 0;
00252 
00254     virtual size_t size() const = 0;
00255 
00257     virtual size_t memUsage() const = 0;
00258 
00260     static Ptr create(const NamePair& type, size_t length);
00262     static bool isRegistered(const NamePair& type);
00264     static void clearRegistry();
00265 
00267     virtual const NamePair& type() const = 0;
00269     template<typename AttributeArrayType>
00270     bool isType() const { return this->type() == AttributeArrayType::attributeType(); }
00271 
00273     template<typename ValueType>
00274     bool hasValueType() const { return this->type().first == typeNameAsString<ValueType>();}
00275 
00277     virtual void set(const Index n, const AttributeArray& sourceArray, const Index sourceIndex) = 0;
00278 
00280     virtual bool isUniform() const = 0;
00283     virtual void expand(bool fill = true) = 0;
00285     virtual void collapse() = 0;
00286 
00288     bool isCompressed() const { return mCompressedBytes != 0; }
00290     virtual bool compress() = 0;
00292     virtual bool decompress() = 0;
00293 
00298     void setHidden(bool state);
00300     bool isHidden() const { return bool(mFlags & HIDDEN); }
00301 
00305     void setTransient(bool state);
00307     bool isTransient() const { return bool(mFlags & TRANSIENT); }
00308 
00310     uint16_t flags() const { return mFlags; }
00311 
00312     IndexIter beginIndex() const;
00313 
00315     virtual void read(std::istream&) = 0;
00317     virtual void write(std::ostream&) const = 0;
00318 
00320     virtual void loadData() const = 0;
00321 
00325     bool operator==(const AttributeArray& other) const;
00326     bool operator!=(const AttributeArray& other) const { return !this->operator==(other); }
00327 
00328 private:
00331     virtual bool isEqual(const AttributeArray& other) const = 0;
00332 
00333 protected:
00335     virtual AccessorBasePtr getAccessor() const = 0;
00336

00340     static void unregisterType(const NamePair& type);
00341

00344

00360 template <typename T>
00361 struct AttributeArray::Accessor : public AttributeArray::AccessorBase
00362 {
00363     typedef T (*GetterPtr)(const AttributeArray* array, const Index n);
00364     typedef void (*SetterPtr)(AttributeArray* array, const Index n, const T& value);
00365     typedef void (*ValuePtr)(AttributeArray* array, const T& value);
00366 
00367     Accessor(GetterPtr getter, SetterPtr setter, ValuePtr collapser, ValuePtr filler) :
00368         mGetter(getter), mSetter(setter), mCollapser(collapser), mFiller(filler) { }
00369 
00370     GetterPtr mGetter;
00371     SetterPtr mSetter;
00372     ValuePtr  mCollapser;
00373     ValuePtr  mFiller;

00461     static void setUnsafe(AttributeArray* array, const Index n, const ValueType& value);
00462

00468 
00472     virtual void expand(bool fill = true);

00538 template <typename T>
00539 class AttributeHandle
00540 {
00541 public:
00542     typedef boost::shared_ptr<AttributeHandle<T> > Ptr;
00543 
00544 protected:
00545     typedef T (*GetterPtr)(const AttributeArray* array, const Index n);
00546     typedef void (*SetterPtr)(AttributeArray* array, const Index n, const T& value);
00547     typedef void (*ValuePtr)(AttributeArray* array, const T& value);
00548 
00549 public:
00550     static Ptr create(const AttributeArray& array, const bool preserveCompression = true);
00551 
00552     AttributeHandle(const AttributeArray& array, const bool preserveCompression = true);
00553 
00554     bool isUniform() const;
00555 
00556     T get(Index n) const;
00557 
00558 protected:
00559     const AttributeArray* mArray;
00560 
00561     GetterPtr mGetter;
00562     SetterPtr mSetter;
00563     ValuePtr  mCollapser;
00564     ValuePtr  mFiller;
00565 
00566 private:
00567     // local copy of AttributeArray (to preserve compression)
00568     AttributeArray::Ptr mLocalArray;
00569 }; // class AttributeHandle

00611 
00612 template<typename StorageType_>
00613 template<typename ValueType>
00614 inline void
00615 NullAttributeCodec<StorageType_>::decode(const StorageType& data, ValueType& val)
00616 {
00617     val = static_cast<ValueType>(data);
00618 }
00619 
00620 
00621 template<typename StorageType_>
00622 template<typename ValueType>
00623 inline void
00624 NullAttributeCodec<StorageType_>::encode(const StorageType& val, ValueType& data)
00625 {
00626     data = static_cast<StorageType>(val);
00627 }
00628 
00629 
00630 template<typename IntType>
00631 template<typename ValueType>
00632 inline void
00633 FixedPointAttributeCodec<IntType>::decode(const StorageType& data, ValueType& val)
00634 {
00635     val = fixedPointToFloatingPoint<ValueType>(data);
00636 
00637     // shift value range to be -0.5 => 0.5 (as this is most commonly used for position)
00638 
00639     val -= ValueType(0.5);
00640 }
00641 
00642 
00643 template<typename IntType>
00644 template<typename ValueType>
00645 inline void
00646 FixedPointAttributeCodec<IntType>::encode(const ValueType& val, StorageType& data)
00647 {
00648     // shift value range to be -0.5 => 0.5 (as this is most commonly used for position)
00649 
00650     const ValueType newVal = val + ValueType(0.5);
00651 
00652     data = floatingPointToFixedPoint<StorageType>(newVal);
00653 }
00654 
00655 
00656 template<typename T>
00657 inline void
00658 UnitVecAttributeCodec::decode(const StorageType& data, math::Vec3<T>& val)
00659 {
00660     val = math::QuantizedUnitVec::unpack(data);
00661 }
00662 
00663 
00664 template<typename T>
00665 inline void
00666 UnitVecAttributeCodec::encode(const math::Vec3<T>& val, StorageType& data)
00667 {
00668     data = math::QuantizedUnitVec::pack(val);
00669 }

00673 
00674 // TypedAttributeArray implementation
00675 
00676 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00677 tbb::atomic<const NamePair*> TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::sTypeName;
00678 
00679 
00680 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00681 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::TypedAttributeArray(
00682     size_t n, const ValueType& uniformValue)
00683     : AttributeArray()
00684     , mData(new StorageType[1])
00685     , mSize(n)
00686     , mIsUniform(true)
00687     , mMutex()
00688 {
00689     mSize = std::max(size_t(1), mSize);
00690     Codec::encode(uniformValue, mData[0]);
00691 }
00692 
00693 
00694 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00695 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::TypedAttributeArray(const TypedAttributeArray& rhs, bool uncompress)
00696     : AttributeArray(rhs)
00697     , mData(NULL)
00698     , mSize(rhs.mSize)
00699     , mIsUniform(rhs.mIsUniform)
00700     , mMutex()
00701 {
00702     using attribute_compression::decompress;
00703     using attribute_compression::uncompressedSize;
00704 
00705     // disable uncompress if data is not compressed
00706 
00707     if (!this->isCompressed())  uncompress = false;
00708 
00709     if (mIsUniform) {
00710         this->allocate(1);
00711         mData[0] = rhs.mData[0];
00712     } else if (this->isOutOfCore()) {
00713         // do nothing
00714     } else if (this->isCompressed()) {
00715         char* buffer = 0;
00716         if (uncompress) {
00717             rhs.doLoad();
00718             const char* charBuffer = reinterpret_cast<char*>(rhs.mData);
00719             buffer = decompress(charBuffer, uncompressedSize(charBuffer));
00720         }
00721         if (buffer)         mCompressedBytes = 0;
00722         else {
00723             // decompression wasn't requested or failed so deep copy instead
00724             buffer = new char[mCompressedBytes];
00725             memcpy(buffer, rhs.mData, mCompressedBytes);
00726         }
00727         assert(buffer);
00728         mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(buffer);
00729     } else {
00730         this->allocate(mSize);
00731         memcpy(mData, rhs.mData, mSize * sizeof(StorageType));
00732     }
00733 }
00734 
00735 
00736 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00737 typename TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::TypedAttributeArray&
00738 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::operator=(const TypedAttributeArray& rhs)
00739 {
00740     if (&rhs != this) {
00741         tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
00742 
00743         this->deallocate();
00744 
00745         mFlags = rhs.mFlags;
00746         mCompressedBytes = rhs.mCompressedBytes;
00747         mSize = rhs.mSize;
00748         mIsUniform = rhs.mIsUniform;
00749 
00750         if (mIsUniform) {
00751             this->allocate(1);
00752             mData[0] = rhs.mData[0];
00753 #ifndef OPENVDB_2_ABI_COMPATIBLE
00754         } else if (rhs.isOutOfCore()) {
00755             mFileInfo = rhs.mFileInfo;
00756 #endif
00757         } else if (this->isCompressed()) {
00758             char* buffer = new char[mCompressedBytes];
00759             memcpy(buffer, rhs.mData, mCompressedBytes);
00760             mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(buffer);
00761         } else {
00762             this->allocate(mSize);
00763             memcpy(mData, rhs.mData, mSize * sizeof(StorageType));
00764         }
00765     }
00766 }
00767 
00768 
00769 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00770 inline const NamePair&
00771 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::attributeType()
00772 {
00773     if (sTypeName == NULL) {
00774         std::ostringstream ostr1, ostr2;
00775         ostr1 << typeNameAsString<ValueType>();
00776         ostr2 << Codec::name() << "_" << typeNameAsString<StorageType>();
00777         NamePair* s = new NamePair(ostr1.str(), ostr2.str());
00778         if (sTypeName.compare_and_swap(s, NULL) != NULL) delete s;
00779     }
00780     return *sTypeName;
00781 }
00782

00789 }

00815 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00816 inline TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>&
00817 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::cast(AttributeArray& attributeArray)
00818 {
00819     if (!attributeArray.isType<TypedAttributeArray>()) {
00820         OPENVDB_THROW(TypeError, "Invalid Attribute Type");
00821     }
00822     return static_cast<TypedAttributeArray&>(attributeArray);
00823 }
00824 
00825 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00826 inline const TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>&
00827 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::cast(const AttributeArray& attributeArray)
00828 {
00829     if (!attributeArray.isType<TypedAttributeArray>()) {
00830         OPENVDB_THROW(TypeError, "Invalid Attribute Type");
00831     }
00832     return static_cast<const TypedAttributeArray&>(attributeArray);
00833 }

00836 AttributeArray::Ptr

00838 {
00839     return AttributeArray::Ptr(new TypedAttributeArray<ValueType, Codec>(*this));
00840 }

00844 AttributeArray::Ptr

00850 
00851 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00852 size_t
00853 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::arrayMemUsage() const
00854 {
00855     if (mIsUniform)                 return sizeof(StorageType);
00856     if (this->isOutOfCore())        return 0;
00857     if (this->isCompressed())       return mCompressedBytes;
00858 
00859     return mSize * sizeof(StorageType);
00860 }
00861 
00862 
00863 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00864 void
00865 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::allocate(const size_t size)
00866 {
00867     assert(!mData);
00868     mData = new StorageType[size];
00869 }
00870 
00871 
00872 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00873 void
00874 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::deallocate()
00875 {
00876 #ifndef OPENVDB_2_ABI_COMPATIBLE
00877     // detach from file if delay-loaded
00878     if (this->isOutOfCore()) {
00879         this->setOutOfCore(false);
00880         this->mFileInfo.reset();
00881     }
00882 #endif
00883     if (mData) {
00884         delete[] mData;
00885         mData = NULL;
00886     }
00887 }
00888 
00889 
00890 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00891 size_t
00892 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::memUsage() const
00893 {
00894     return sizeof(*this) + (mData != NULL ? this->arrayMemUsage() : 0);
00895 }
00896 
00897 
00898 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00899 typename TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::ValueType
00900 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::getUnsafe(Index n) const
00901 {
00902     assert(!this->isCompressed());
00903     assert(!this->isOutOfCore());
00904 
00905     ValueType val;
00906     Codec::decode(/*in=*/mData[mIsUniform ? 0 : n], /*out=*/val);
00907     return val;
00908 }
00909 
00910 
00911 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00912 typename TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::ValueType
00913 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::get(Index n) const
00914 {
00915     if (this->isCompressed())           const_cast<TypedAttributeArray*>(this)->decompress();
00916     else if (this->isOutOfCore())       this->doLoad();
00917 
00918     return this->getUnsafe(n);
00919 }

00922 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00923 template<typename T>
00924 void
00925 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::getUnsafe(Index n, T& val) const
00926 {
00927     assert(!this->isCompressed());
00928     assert(!this->isOutOfCore());
00929 
00930     ValueType tmp;
00931     Codec::decode(/*in=*/mData[mIsUniform ? 0 : n], /*out=*/tmp);
00932     val = static_cast<T>(tmp);
00933 }

00939 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::get(Index n, T& val) const
00940 {
00941     if (this->isCompressed())           const_cast<TypedAttributeArray*>(this)->decompress();
00942     else if (this->isOutOfCore())       this->doLoad();
00943 
00944     this->getUnsafe(n, val);
00945 }

00956 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00957 void
00958 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::setUnsafe(Index n, const ValueType& val)
00959 {
00960     assert(!this->isCompressed());
00961     assert(!this->isOutOfCore());
00962 
00963     if (mIsUniform)     this->expand();
00964 
00965     Codec::encode(/*in=*/val, /*out=*/mData[n]);
00966 }

00972 {
00973     if (this->isCompressed())           this->decompress();
00974     else if (this->isOutOfCore())       this->doLoad();
00975 
00976     this->setUnsafe(n, val);
00977 }

00980 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00981 template<typename T>
00982 void
00983 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::setUnsafe(Index n, const T& val)
00984 {
00985     assert(!this->isCompressed());
00986     assert(!this->isOutOfCore());
00987 
00988     if (mIsUniform)     this->expand();
00989 
00990     const ValueType tmp = static_cast<ValueType>(val);
00991     Codec::encode(/*in=*/tmp, /*out=*/mData[n]);
00992 }

00997 void
00998 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::set(Index n, const T& val)
00999 {
01000     if (this->isCompressed())           this->decompress();
01001     else if (this->isOutOfCore())       this->doLoad();
01002 
01003     this->setUnsafe(n, val);
01004 }

01015 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01016 void
01017 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::set(Index n, const AttributeArray& sourceArray, const Index sourceIndex)
01018 {
01019     const TypedAttributeArray& sourceTypedArray = static_cast<const TypedAttributeArray&>(sourceArray);
01020 
01021     ValueType sourceValue;
01022     sourceTypedArray.get(sourceIndex, sourceValue);
01023 
01024     this->set(n, sourceValue);
01025 }
01026 
01027 
01028 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01029 void
01030 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::expand(bool fill)
01031 {
01032     if (!mIsUniform)    return;
01033 
01034     const StorageType val = mData[0];
01035 
01036     {
01037         tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
01038         this->deallocate();
01039         this->allocate(mSize);
01040     }
01041 
01042     mCompressedBytes = 0;
01043     mIsUniform = false;
01044 
01045     if (fill) {
01046         for (size_t i = 0; i < mSize; ++i)  mData[i] = val;
01047     }
01048 }
01049 
01050 
01051 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01052 void
01053 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::collapse()
01054 {
01055     this->collapse(zeroVal<ValueType>());
01056 }
01057 
01058 
01059 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01060 void
01061 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::collapse(const ValueType& uniformValue)
01062 {
01063     if (!mIsUniform) {
01064         tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
01065         this->deallocate();
01066         this->allocate(1);
01067         mIsUniform = true;
01068     }
01069     Codec::encode(uniformValue, mData[0]);
01070 }
01071 
01072 
01073 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01074 void
01075 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::collapse(AttributeArray* array, const ValueType& value)
01076 {
01077     static_cast<TypedAttributeArray<ValueType, Codec>*>(array)->collapse(value);
01078 }
01079 
01080 
01081 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01082 void
01083 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::fill(const ValueType& value)
01084 {
01085     if (this->isOutOfCore()) {
01086         tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
01087         this->deallocate();
01088         this->allocate(mSize);
01089     }
01090 
01091     const size_t size = mIsUniform ? 1 : mSize;
01092     for (size_t i = 0; i < size; ++i)  {
01093         Codec::encode(value, mData[i]);
01094     }
01095 }
01096 
01097 
01098 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01099 void
01100 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::fill(AttributeArray* array, const ValueType& value)
01101 {
01102     static_cast<TypedAttributeArray<ValueType, Codec>*>(array)->fill(value);
01103 }
01104 
01105 
01106 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01107 inline bool
01108 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::compress()
01109 {
01110     using attribute_compression::canCompress;
01111     using attribute_compression::compress;
01112 
01113     if (!canCompress())     return false;
01114 
01115     if (!mIsUniform && !this->isCompressed()) {
01116 
01117         tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
01118 
01119         this->doLoadUnsafe();
01120 
01121         const size_t typeSize = sizeof(typename Codec_::StorageType);
01122         const int inBytes = int(mSize * sizeof(StorageType));
01123         int outBytes;
01124         char* charBuffer = reinterpret_cast<char*>(mData);
01125         char* buffer = compress(charBuffer, typeSize, inBytes, outBytes, /*cleanup=*/true);
01126 
01127         if (buffer) {
01128             mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(buffer);
01129             mCompressedBytes = size_t(outBytes);
01130             return true;
01131         }
01132     }
01133 
01134     return false;
01135 }
01136 
01137 
01138 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01139 inline bool
01140 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::decompress()
01141 {
01142     using attribute_compression::decompress;
01143     using attribute_compression::uncompressedSize;
01144 
01145     tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
01146 
01147     if (this->isCompressed()) {
01148         this->doLoadUnsafe();
01149         char* charBuffer = reinterpret_cast<char*>(this->mData);
01150         char* buffer = decompress(charBuffer, uncompressedSize(charBuffer));
01151         if (buffer) {
01152             mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(buffer);
01153             mCompressedBytes = 0;
01154             return true;
01155         }
01156     }
01157 
01158     return false;
01159 }
01160 
01161 
01162 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01163 bool
01164 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::isOutOfCore() const
01165 {
01166 #ifndef OPENVDB_2_ABI_COMPATIBLE
01167     return (mFlags & OUTOFCORE);
01168 #else
01169     return false;
01170 #endif
01171 }
01172 
01173 
01174 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01175 void
01176 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::setOutOfCore(const bool b)
01177 {
01178 #ifndef OPENVDB_2_ABI_COMPATIBLE
01179     if (b)  mFlags |= OUTOFCORE;
01180     else    mFlags &= ~OUTOFCORE;
01181 #else
01182     (void) b;
01183 #endif
01184 }
01185 
01186 
01187 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01188 void
01189 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::doLoad() const
01190 {
01191 #ifndef OPENVDB_2_ABI_COMPATIBLE
01192     if (!(this->isOutOfCore()))     return;
01193 
01194     TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>* self = const_cast<TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>*>(this);
01195 
01196     // This lock will be contended at most once, after which this buffer
01197     // will no longer be out-of-core.
01198     tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(self->mMutex);
01199     this->doLoadUnsafe();
01200 #endif
01201 }
01202 
01203 
01204 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01205 void
01206 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::loadData() const
01207 {
01208     this->doLoad();
01209 }
01210 
01211 
01212 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01213 void
01214 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::read(std::istream& is)
01215 {
01216     using attribute_compression::decompress;
01217 
01218     // read data
01219 
01220     Index64 bytes = Index64(0);
01221     is.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&bytes), sizeof(Index64));
01222     bytes = bytes - /*flags*/sizeof(Int16) - /*size*/sizeof(Index64);
01223 
01224     Int16 flags = Int16(0);
01225     is.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&flags), sizeof(Int16));
01226     mFlags = flags;
01227 
01228     Index64 size = Index64(0);
01229     is.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&size), sizeof(Index64));
01230     mSize = size;
01231 
01232     char* buffer = new char[bytes];
01233 
01234     // read uniform and compressed state
01235 
01236     mIsUniform = mFlags & WRITEUNIFORM;
01237     mCompressedBytes = mFlags & WRITEMEMCOMPRESS ? bytes : Index64(0);
01238 
01239     // clear uniform and compress flags
01240 
01241     mFlags &= Int16(~WRITEUNIFORM & ~WRITEMEMCOMPRESS);
01242 
01243     tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
01244 
01245     this->deallocate();
01246 
01247 #ifndef OPENVDB_2_ABI_COMPATIBLE
01248     // If this array is being read from a memory-mapped file, delay loading of its data
01249     // until the data is actually accessed.
01250     io::MappedFile::Ptr mappedFile = io::getMappedFilePtr(is);
01251     const bool delayLoad = (mappedFile.get() != NULL);
01252 
01253     if (delayLoad) {
01254         this->setOutOfCore(true);
01255         mFileInfo.reset(new FileInfo);
01256         mFileInfo->bufpos = is.tellg();
01257         mFileInfo->mapping = mappedFile;
01258         mFileInfo->bytes = bytes;
01259         mFileInfo->meta = io::getStreamMetadataPtr(is);
01260 
01261         // read and discard buffer
01262         is.read(buffer, bytes);
01263         delete[] buffer;
01264         return;
01265     }
01266 #endif
01267 
01268     is.read(buffer, bytes);
01269 
01270     // compressed on-disk
01271 
01272     if (mFlags & WRITEDISKCOMPRESS) {
01273 
01274         // decompress buffer
01275 
01276         const int inBytes = int(mSize * sizeof(StorageType));
01277         char* newBuffer = decompress(buffer, inBytes, /*cleanup=*/true);
01278         if (newBuffer)  buffer = newBuffer;
01279     }
01280 
01281     // set data to buffer
01282 
01283     mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(buffer);
01284 
01285     // clear all write flags
01286 
01287     mFlags &= Int16(~WRITEDISKCOMPRESS);
01288 }
01289 
01290 
01291 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01292 void
01293 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::write(std::ostream& os) const
01294 {
01295     using attribute_compression::compress;
01296 
01297     if (this->isTransient())    return;
01298 
01299     Int16 flags(mFlags);
01300     Index64 size(mSize);
01301 
01302     boost::scoped_array<char> compressedBuffer;
01303     int compressedBytes = 0;
01304 
01305     this->doLoad();
01306 
01307     if (mIsUniform)
01308     {
01309         flags |= WRITEUNIFORM;
01310     }
01311     else if (this->isCompressed())
01312     {
01313         flags |= WRITEMEMCOMPRESS;
01314     }
01315     else if (io::getDataCompression(os) & io::COMPRESS_BLOSC)
01316     {
01317         const char* charBuffer = reinterpret_cast<const char*>(mData);
01318         const size_t typeSize = sizeof(typename Codec_::StorageType);
01319         const int inBytes = int(mSize * sizeof(StorageType));
01320         compressedBuffer.reset(compress(charBuffer, typeSize, inBytes, compressedBytes));
01321         if (compressedBuffer)   flags |= WRITEDISKCOMPRESS;
01322     }
01323 
01324     Index64 bytes = /*flags*/ sizeof(Int16) + /*size*/ sizeof(Index64);
01325 
01326     bytes += compressedBuffer ? compressedBytes : this->arrayMemUsage();
01327 
01328     // write data
01329 
01330     os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&bytes), sizeof(Index64));
01331     os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&flags), sizeof(Int16));
01332     os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&size), sizeof(Index64));
01333 
01334     if (compressedBuffer)   os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(compressedBuffer.get()), compressedBytes);
01335     else                    os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(mData), this->arrayMemUsage());
01336 }
01337 
01338 
01339 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01340 void
01341 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::doLoadUnsafe() const
01342 {
01343     using attribute_compression::decompress;
01344 
01345 #ifndef OPENVDB_2_ABI_COMPATIBLE
01346     if (!(this->isOutOfCore()))     return;
01347 
01348     // this function expects the mutex to already be locked
01349 
01350     TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>* self = const_cast<TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>*>(this);
01351 
01352     assert(self->mFileInfo);
01353     assert(self->mFileInfo->mapping.get() != NULL);
01354 
01355     FileInfo& info = *(self->mFileInfo);
01356 
01357     boost::shared_ptr<std::streambuf> buf = info.mapping->createBuffer();
01358     std::istream is(buf.get());
01359 
01360     const Index64 bytes = info.bytes;
01361 
01362     is.seekg(info.bufpos);
01363 
01364     char* buffer = new char[bytes];
01365     is.read(buffer, bytes);
01366 
01367     // compressed on-disk
01368 
01369     if (mFlags & WRITEDISKCOMPRESS) {
01370 
01371         // decompress buffer
01372 
01373         const int inBytes = int(mSize * sizeof(StorageType));
01374         char* newBuffer = decompress(buffer, inBytes, /*cleanup=*/true);
01375         if (newBuffer)  buffer = newBuffer;
01376     }
01377 
01378     // set data to buffer
01379 
01380     self->mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(buffer);
01381 
01382     // clear write and out-of-core flags
01383 
01384     self->mFlags &= Int16(~WRITEDISKCOMPRESS & ~OUTOFCORE);
01385 #endif
01386 }
01387 
01388 
01389 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01390 AttributeArray::AccessorBasePtr
01391 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::getAccessor() const
01392 {
01393     // use the faster 'unsafe' get and set methods as attribute handles
01394     // ensure data is uncompressed and in-core when constructed
01395 
01396     return AccessorBasePtr(new AttributeArray::Accessor<ValueType_>(
01397         &TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::getUnsafe,
01398         &TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::setUnsafe,
01399         &TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::collapse,
01400         &TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::fill));
01401 }
01402 
01403 
01404 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
01405 bool
01406 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::isEqual(const AttributeArray& other) const
01407 {
01408     const TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>* const otherT = dynamic_cast<const TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>* >(&other);
01409     if(!otherT) return false;
01410     if(this->mSize != otherT->mSize ||
01411        this->mIsUniform != otherT->mIsUniform ||
01412        *this->sTypeName != *otherT->sTypeName) return false;
01413 
01414     this->doLoad();
01415 
01416     const StorageType *target = this->mData, *source = otherT->mData;
01417     if (!target && !source) return true;
01418     if (!target || !source) return false;
01419     Index n = this->mIsUniform ? 1 : mSize;
01420     while (n && math::isExactlyEqual(*target++, *source++)) --n;
01421     return n == 0;
01422 }
01423 
01425 
01426 // AttributeHandle implementation
01427 
01428 template <typename T>
01429 typename AttributeHandle<T>::Ptr
01430 AttributeHandle<T>::create(const AttributeArray& array, const bool preserveCompression)
01431 {
01432     return typename AttributeHandle<T>::Ptr(new AttributeHandle<T>(array, preserveCompression));
01433 }
01434 
01435 template <typename T>
01436 AttributeHandle<T>::AttributeHandle(const AttributeArray& array, const bool preserveCompression)
01437     : mArray(&array)
01438 {
01439     // load data if delay-loaded
01440 
01441     mArray->loadData();
01442 
01443     // if array is compressed and preserve compression is true, copy and decompress
01444     // into a local copy that is destroyed with handle to maintain thread-safety
01445 
01446     if (array.isCompressed())
01447     {
01448         if (preserveCompression) {
01449             mLocalArray = array.copyUncompressed();
01450             mLocalArray->decompress();
01451             mArray = mLocalArray.get();
01452         }
01453         else {
01454             const_cast<AttributeArray*>(mArray)->decompress();
01455         }
01456     }
01457 
01458     // bind getter and setter methods
01459 
01460     AttributeArray::AccessorBasePtr accessor = mArray->getAccessor();
01461     assert(accessor);
01462 
01463     AttributeArray::Accessor<T>* typedAccessor = static_cast<AttributeArray::Accessor<T>*>(accessor.get());
01464 
01465     if (!typedAccessor) {
01466         OPENVDB_THROW(RuntimeError, "Cannot bind AttributeHandle due to mis-matching types.");
01467     }
01468 
01469     mGetter = typedAccessor->mGetter;
01470     mSetter = typedAccessor->mSetter;
01471     mCollapser = typedAccessor->mCollapser;
01472     mFiller = typedAccessor->mFiller;
01473 }
01474 
01475 
01476 template <typename T>
01477 T AttributeHandle<T>::get(Index n) const
01478 {
01479     return mGetter(mArray, n);
01480 }
01481 
01482 template <typename T>
01483 bool AttributeHandle<T>::isUniform() const
01484 {
01485     return mArray->isUniform();
01486 }
01487

01490 // AttributeWriteHandle implementation
01491 
01492 template <typename T>
01493 typename AttributeWriteHandle<T>::Ptr
01494 AttributeWriteHandle<T>::create(AttributeArray& array)
01495 {
01496     return typename AttributeWriteHandle<T>::Ptr(new AttributeWriteHandle<T>(array));
01497 }
01498 
01499 template <typename T>
01500 AttributeWriteHandle<T>::AttributeWriteHandle(AttributeArray& array)
01501     : AttributeHandle<T>(array, /*preserveCompression = */ false) { }
01502 
01503 template <typename T>
01504 void AttributeWriteHandle<T>::set(Index n, const T& value)
01505 {
01506     this->mSetter(const_cast<AttributeArray*>(this->mArray), n, value);
01507 }
01508 
01509 template <typename T>
01510 void AttributeWriteHandle<T>::expand(const bool fill)
01511 {
01512     const_cast<AttributeArray*>(this->mArray)->expand(fill);
01513 }
01514 
01515 template <typename T>
01516 void AttributeWriteHandle<T>::collapse()
01517 {
01518     const_cast<AttributeArray*>(this->mArray)->collapse();
01519 }
01520 
01521 template <typename T>
01522 void AttributeWriteHandle<T>::collapse(const T& uniformValue)
01523 {
01524     this->mCollapser(const_cast<AttributeArray*>(this->mArray), uniformValue);
01525 }
01526 
01527 template <typename T>
01528 void AttributeWriteHandle<T>::fill(const T& value)
01529 {
01530     this->mFiller(const_cast<AttributeArray*>(this->mArray), value);
01531 }
